main.radialhotbar.title: Radial Hot Bar
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.radialhot: A faster way to access your items on hot bar
config.radialhotbar.option.scaleFactor.t: Controls how big the radial hot bar appears on screen.
config.radialhotbar.option.shownames.too: Shows item name in radial hot bar slots.
config.radialhotbar.option.hideEmptySlot: If true, empty slots on hot bar will not appear in the radial menu.
config.radialhotbar.option.useCenterItem: Show a item preview in the center
Enables the item preview shown in the center of the radial menu.
config.radialhotbar.option.allowMovement: Allows the player to move while the radial menu is open.
config.radialhotbar.option.autoSort.tool: Automatically sorts items by category: Tools, Weapons, Food, Blocks, and Potions.
config.radialhotbar.option.autoEquipArmo: Automatically equips armor when it is selected from the radial menu.
config.radialhotbar.option.swapToRecentO: Swap to Previously Used Slot (If No Selection)
If no slot is selected in the radial menu, the radial menu swaps between the current and previously used slots.
